theory.checking.oldText: <head>Checking the solution</head><par>It is still wise to check the solution. To do so, we insert the solution into the original equation. Doing so gets us <block-math/> Simplifying the innermost fraction turns this into <block-math/> Multiplying both sides of the outer fraction by <inline-math/> further reduces this to <block-math/> Finally getting rid of the brackets, canceling the <inline-math/> term and subsequently the <inline-math/> factor will reduce this to <block-math/> This equation obviously holds, which means that the solution we found is correct.</par>
